description:
Watch as DM Scotty shows you how to craft your own forest boards for use in D&D, Pathfinder and other RPGs.

Join DM Scotty's Facebook group for DM's Craft updates and info: 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Visit the DM's Craft Forum to meet other crafters, see cool pics of crafted stuff and pick up great tips and tricks: http://dmscraft.proboards.com/ A special thanks to Mad Lad Designs, AJ and DMG for helping to moderate The DM's Craft forum.

Also vist TheDMGinfo channel for more great 2.5D projects and ideas: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJLqz6kcB1gMPiVnL0XfUDg
title: How to craft a forest area for D&D (The DM's Craft Ep 11, p 2)
